author: Kirsten Korosec
title: Zillow suspends home buying due to COVID-19
description: Zillow said Monday it will temporarily stop buying homes in all 24 markets where it operates in response to public health orders related to the COVID-19 pandemic, the latest real estate startup to shift how it operates as the disease caused by coronavirus con…
